items.title: GCA Launcher is an Android Go-friendly launcher inspired by Chrome OS and Pixel Launcher
items.description: GCA Launcher, or Go Custom Android Launcher, is a launcher built with Android Go users in mind, giving them Chrome OS and Pixel Launcher inspired features.

items.title: GCA, an Android launcher app inspired by Chrome OS design, gets a massive rework in version 2.0
items.description: GCA (Go Custom Android) Launcher gets major redesign in version 2.0 with new features and support for Android 10 navigation gestures.

items.title: No'Me is a launcher manager for those of you with multiple launcher apps
items.description: No'Me is a new launcher manager app that lets you easily switch between third-party launchers on your device with a single tap.

items.title: Google Pixel Fold Edge Panel Multitasking, Launchers Quick Tile and Popup Calc apps
items.description: A Youtube video that mentions my Launchers Quick Tile app

items.title: A Much Easier Way to switch Launchers on any android app
